title: Multiple issues with NeighboringFilesQuery and file system indexer
body: There are several issues with the file activation NeighboringFilesQuery argument and the file system indexer.

comments.body: This definitely sounds like a bug to me. It can't be security considerations, since you do have access to the neighboring files. You could read all file content, so why can't you read the properties? It does not make sense.
